scripts.dev:ts: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently " pnpm build:ts" "tsc -w" "ts-node-dev -r tsconfig-paths/register --transpile-only src/server.ts | pino-pretty --colorize"
scripts.dev:js: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "tsc -w" " pnpm build:ts && nodemon dist/server.js"
scripts.build:ts: rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc-alias && pnpm copy:config
scripts.webpack: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm build:ts && webpack --config webpack.config.ts
scripts.prisma:init: dotenv -e .env.development pnpm exec prisma init && rimraf .env
scripts.prisma:dev: dotenv -e .env.development pnpm exec prisma db pull && dotenv -e .env.development pnpm exec prisma generate
scripts.prisma:deploy: dotenv -e .env.production pnpm exec prisma db pull && dotenv -e .env.production pnpm exec prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: dotenv -e .env.development pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma:reset: dotenv -e .env.development pnpm exec prisma migrate reset
